settings.subtitle: Become an ambassador
settings.title: We're looking for a few amazing people:
You could be our next ambassador if...

settings.text:
We’re looking for the most influential, inspiring people who have a large following on social media, or leading in your community, industry or business.

As a family oriented business, we recognize the value of all types of Ambassadors—including those who have both large and intimate followings.

Mostly, we want to know you have an engaged fanbase of people you inspire.

Think this might be for you?
You might be a great fit if...

You have an engaged following on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube or another
social media platform.

You’re already a role model in your industry.


You have a strong voice and you aren’t afraid to use it.


You’d love to be the “face” and “voice” of Plantsbasically to our following of 30,000+
engaged followers.

You feel completely at ease filming short videos on your phone, laptop or other
device. (Or having someone else film you!)

You love Plantsbasically and you’re excited to spread the word about what we do.


Sound like you? Great, we’d love to hear from you!
